name: イーシャの魔法図書室
name_original: イーシャの魔法図書室
description:
A rogue-like dungeon game where you fight using magic!

Make full use of the spell book with the wizard Isha
Let's capture the dungeon!

Selection of items in each hierarchy
How to accumulate magical power and knowledge is the key to strategy

You can get items for each level
The upper limit is 10, so selection is the key to strategy
Clear the dungeon after defeating all 10 floors of enemies within the turn limit.
The score is determined according to the turn and status at the time of clearing
Let's do our best to clear all dungeon ☆ 5!
